pr_title: Fix CircleCI config to comply with Gradle docs

timeline.message:
Fix CircleCI config to comply with Gradle docs

Signed-off-by: Horacio Mijail Anton Quiles <hmijail@gmail.com>

Allow Gradle to decide how many tasks to launch

Signed-off-by: Horacio Mijail Anton Quiles <hmijail@gmail.com>

Use GRADLE_MAX_TESTS_FORKS to hardcode the number of forks

Signed-off-by: Horacio Mijail Anton Quiles <hmijail@gmail.com>

Conservatively re-add no-daemon to unknown cases

Signed-off-by: Horacio Mijail Anton Quiles <hmijail@gmail.com>

Remove daemon, redundant CLI args

Signed-off-by: Horacio Mijail Anton Quiles <hmijail@gmail.com>

timeline.bodyText: Let's keep --no-daemon - daemons are useless in ci docker images.
timeline.author: shemnon
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -68,7 +68,7 @@ jobs:
       - run:
           name: Assemble
           command: |
-            ./gradlew --no-daemon --parallel clean spotlessCheck compileJava compileTestJava assemble

replies.bodyText:
Are these changes still requested, given that Gradle specially recommends the daemon in CI?
Should I add --no-daemon only to JMH?
At any rate I can confirm that acceptance tests work well without the daemon (and I'd say faster, but I haven't real measurements). And this build did finish correctly.
replies.author: hmijail

timeline.message:
Back to no-daemons

Signed-off-by: Horacio Mijail Anton Quiles <hmijail@gmail.com>
